creditline: Gift of Christopher C. Schwabacher and Brenda S. Webster
description: abstract painting in multi-colored pigments; pale purple color along outer top edge, around lower right and left edges, and along bottom edge; green rectangular shape in LLC; two thick, yellow stripes in right and left center; orange shape loosely resembling a house in center; green star shapes center and in upper left quadrant; thick, pale green band of color in center right; thin orange lines in upper left quadrant; pink floral shapes in upper left and lower left quadrants
markings: on back, gallery labels from Anita Shapolksy Gallery, Jane Voorhees-Zimmerli Art Museum, Knoxville Museum of Art, and Betty Parsons Gallery
signed: lower right quadrant, in purple paint: E.S. \'55
title: La Joie de Ma Mere
